title: Thihna lui piahah khawpui mawi tak chu a awm
lyrics:
Thihna lui piahah khawpui mawi tak chu a awm,
A ropui zia sawi hleih theih loh kha;
Chutah ni tlak leh zan thim a awm tawh ngai lo,
Chu khawpui mawi leh nuam takah chuan.

Ram ni tlakna ngai loh, chatuana engah chuan,
Mi thianghlimten an Chhandamtu an fak fo thin;
Chu khawpui mawi leh nuam takah chuan.

Chuta kan Lalber, kan Chhandamtu duh tak chu,
Ringtuten lawm takin an hmu ang;
Chatuanin van arsite ang khian an eng ang,
Chu khawpui mawi leh nuam takah chuan.

Kraws bual mi tin thlarau kan rawn hruaite chu,
Beramno huanga kan khungte chu;
Kan lallukhum timawitu an lo ni ang a,
Chu khawpui mawi leh nuam takah chuan.
